mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Colton, J. H. (Joseph Hutchins), 1800-1893 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map does not include Wise County, which was formed in 1856. [original]
Two insets: Richmond Henrico County, Manchester and Spring Hill Chesterfield Co. -- Norfolk, Portsmouth and Gosport. (separate scales) [original]
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1855 by J.H. Colton & Co. in the Clerks Office of the District Court for the Southern District of New York." [original]
Explanations: Rail Roads, Common, Canals, State Capital, County Towns, Vill. P.O. & Depots [original]
Printed on lightweight paper, without plate number. [original]
Was probably folded into covers which are no longer present. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Maps--19th century
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: New York (City), New York (State), United States
